s1.title: Talk to Luna
s1.description: Luna understands how you feel and replies with empathy. Natural voice, calm pace, and practical guidance.
s1.feature1Desc: Luna uses natural language processing to understand your emotions and offer empathetic, contextual responses.
s1.feature2Desc: She remembers your previous conversations to provide personalized and consistent support over time.
s1.feature3Desc: Access whenever you need, with no appointments or waiting queues.

s2.title: Guided sessions
s2.description: Short practices with ambient music: 4-7-8, box breathing, relaxation, gratitude, sleep, and focus.
s2.feature1Desc: 4-7-8 breathing, Box Breathing, progressive muscle relaxation, mindfulness, and guided visualization.
s2.feature2Desc: Nature sounds, binaural frequencies, and relaxing melodies to enhance the exercises.
s2.feature3Desc: Practices adaptable to your routine, whether for a quick break or a deeper moment of self-care.

s3.title: SOS with calming music
s3.description: In distress, tap SOS: short breathing, reassurance, and guidance to immediate help.
s3.feature1Desc: One tap on the SOS button starts an emergency breathing session with instant calming music.
s3.feature2Desc: Guided voice that accompanies you during the crisis, teaching emotional regulation techniques in real-time.
s3.feature3Desc: Quick access to Lifeline (988), Emergency (911), and other professional support resources.

s4.title: Journal & progress
s4.description: Record how you feel, track your progress, and discover what helps you most.
s4.feature1Desc: Track your feelings, triggers, and patterns over time with data-based insights.
s4.feature2Desc: Visualize your emotional evolution with intuitive graphs showing how you're progressing.
s4.feature3Desc: Based on your history, Luna suggests ideal practices and times for your exercises.
